column4: Since installing Ubuntu I've been getting *ASTROCIOUSLY* slow download speeds
Is there something I need to do configure?
Since installing Ubuntu I've been getting *ASTROCIOUSLY* slow download speeds
Can someone recommend a good download manager?
whats your problem? repeat that is more helpful...
what do you try to download?
try wgetting a ubuntu iso from an official server and check the speed - how fast is it?
sorry i dropped out: you got the results?
i asked you to download a ubuntu iso and check how fast it is (dont need to complete, just like 10secs)
your ram isnt filled up and your pc isnt constantly swapping?
you complained about a slow internet connection, didnt you? and the second one could be that everything needs to be written to disk first whtat takes longer
